text: St. Jakob-Park is a football stadium in Basel, Switzerland and is the home stadium of FC Basel. It is the largest football stadium in Switzerland. The stadium is known locally as Joggeli. It has a capacity of 38,512. St. Jakob Park was opened on 15 March 2001. The stadium cost around CHF 220 million to build. The stadium is a UEFA Category 4 Stadium. It was used for the UEFA Euro 2008 and the 2016 UEFA Europa League Final. == Other websites == * Official website Category:2001 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Switzerland Category:Football stadiums in Switzerland Category:Basel
title: St. Jakob-Park
